detail_desc: Tops in organic cotton jersey with a gathered neckline and short puff sleeves.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Bra top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a racer back and elasticated hem.
T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Short shorts in soft viscose jersey with side pockets and wide elasticated smocking at the top for best fit over the tummy.
Fitted, knee-length dress in a fine knit with a sheen. Textured-knit stripes, pointelle-patterned sections and 3/4-length sleeves.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with high-cut legs and a low V-cut waist.
Hat in braided straw containing glittery threads. Width of brim 8.5 cm.
Top in sturdy, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Chinos in an airy cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket with a button, and tapered legs.
Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Seam with pleats at the waist and short sleeves with narrow elastication and gathers. Unlined.
Leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a small embroidered detail at the top.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Round-necked T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Wide trousers in a cool viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Top in block-patterned sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in a viscose weave with sturdier trim details. Collar, concealed buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Long, deep-cut raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs that can be rolled up and fastened with D-rings. Rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Long pattern-weave dress in crinkled chiffon with a V-neck, wrapover front and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Smocking at the back, a concealed zip in one side, a seam under the bust and a softly draping skirt. Lined.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
Wide polo-neck jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Vest top in soft slub cotton jersey with a racer back.
Wide T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Knee-length, printed swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Straight-cut top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with flatlock seams at the cuffs.
Hat in a printed weave with reflective details, a turned-up peak, earflaps and a hook and loop fastening under the chin. Lining in faux fur and fleece.

5-pocket shorts in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Worn details with patches on the inside, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Ankle-length trousers in a sturdy weave with a high waist, pleats at the top, a zip fly and two pairs of hook-and-eye fasteners. Detachable tie belt, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details, removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and wide ribbing at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Regular fit.
Fine-knit ankle socks in a cotton blend with wide elastication at the top.
Long-sleeved piqué top in fine-knit merino wool with a ribbed collar, button placket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short T-shirt in soft viscose with a print motif on the front and tie detail at the hem.
Knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist that is elasticated at the back. Detachable tie belt, pleats at the top and concealed buttons down the front. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved tops with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Sleeveless shirt dress in a soft weave with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket with a button and pockets in the side seams. Detachable belt in braided imitation suede and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Jacquard-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist and soft terry inside.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a small imitation suede appliqué at the hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in an airy weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Fitted mesh top with long sleeves.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide elasticated hem. Light support.
Jersey fancy dress cape with a hood with appliqués and a concealed hook and loop fastening at the neck. Unlined.
Long-sleeved polo-neck top in ribbed jersey made from a modal and cotton blend.

Fabric sandals with crossover straps with a decorative knot at the front, and a braided jute trim around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform front approx. 2.5 cm, heel 4 cm.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on top.
Knee socks in a soft fine-knit.
Hooded jacket in soft pile with jersey trims, a zip down the front with a chin guard and welt side pockets. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an intarsia-knit motif on the front, long sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports set with a short-sleeved top and shorts in fast-drying, functional fabric. Top with a print motif on the front and reflective details. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Block-coloured T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a dress in a soft viscose weave and a faux fur gilet. Dress with a round neckline, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and a yoke with a frill trim that continues over the shoulders. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Unlined. Gilet with a concealed button at the top. Lined.

Shirt in a checked cotton weave with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Short, fitted dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a low-cut neckline front and back. Short puff sleeves with wide elastication over the shoulders and narrow elastication at the hems. Seam under the bust and a smocked skirt. Unlined.
Jumper in a rib-knit wool blend with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide ribbing at the cuffs, and a ribbed hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumpsuit in organic cotton-blend sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood. Contrasting colour zip, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Double-layer hat in a soft rib knit.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a wide, detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Long-sleeved top and a pair of trousers in soft fabric. Top in sweatshirt fabric with a text motif on the front, press-studs on one shoulder, raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Leggings in jersey made from a soft, organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. One patterned pair and one pair in a solid colour.
Long-sleeved nightshirt in soft, cool satin with notch lapels and buttons down the front.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a draped neckline at the front and concealed zip at the back. Long sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. Seam at the waist, a detachable fabric belt with metal D-rings and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and bottoms in soft fleece with a shimmering print. Top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, narrow elastication at the sides and string back. Lined.
Trousers in an airy cotton and linen weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Welt coin pocket, pockets in the side seams and flap back pockets with a button.
Coat in a soft, felted wool blend with a brushed finish. Notch lapels, a tie belt at the waist, concealed side pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.

Pile-lined parka in a cotton weave with padded sleeves, a stand-up collar and pile-lined hood with a detachable faux-fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and a concealed pocket behind with a press-stud at the top. Elasticated tab with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, and a small back vent. Lined.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.

Knee-length dress in soft, patterned jersey with a V-neck and wrapover top that has a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Short sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and a skirt with a sewn-in wrapover and decorative ties at one side. Unlined.
Ankle-length suit trousers in a crêpe weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Fake front pockets with decorative metal buttons, and straight, wide legs with creases.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow smocking and ties at the cuffs.
Iron-on fabric patches in different designs and sizes. Size from 4x6.5 cm to 6x7 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Fabric trainers with concealed elastication at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
